DESCRIPTION: You cannot 失去 more than a given amount of 生命 in a single turn. NL At the end of any round in which Invincible prevented 生命 loss, remove it。
Orb: Deals damage to 所有敌人。
Stance: If you have less than #b6 Plated Armor 你的回合开始时， 获得 #b2 Plated Armor. NL When you leave this Stance, 获得 #b1 Artifact。
